INSERT INTO client_tb_park_record ( USER_ID, CAR_NO, RESERVE_ID, START_TIME, STATE, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_USER ) VALUES ( #userId#, #carNo#, #reserveId#, NOW(), 'U', NOW(), #modifyUser#, NOW(), #modifyUser# )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
sqlMap.update: UPDATE client_tb_park_record t SET t.modify_date = NOW(), t.modify_user = #modifyUser#, t.end_time = NOW(), t.state = 'F' WHERE t.state = 'U' AND t.reserve_id = #reserveId# AND t.user_id = #userId#

UPDATE client_tb_park_record t SET t.modify_date = NOW(), t.modify_user = #modifyUser#, t.state = #state# WHERE t.state <> #state# AND t.user_id = #userId# AND EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM client_tb_trade p, client_tb_order k WHERE p.trade_id = k.trade_id AND k.record_id = t.record_id AND p.user_id = #userId# AND p.trade_id = #tradeId#)
sqlMap.select:
SELECT t.record_id AS recordId, t.car_no AS carNo, DATE_FORMAT(t.start_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS startTime, DATE_FORMAT(t.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS endTime, t.cost, q.cost_type AS costType, k.park_name AS parkName FROM client_tb_park_record t, client_tb_park_reserve p, boss_tb_park_space q, boss_tb_park k WHERE t.reserve_id = p.reserve_id AND p.space_id = q.space_id AND q.park_id = k.park_id AND t.state = #state# AND t.user_id = #userId#
t.car_no = #carNo#
ORDER BY t.start_time ASC

SELECT t.record_id AS recordId, DATE_FORMAT(t.start_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS startTime, DATE_FORMAT(t.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS endTime, t.reserve_id AS reserveId, t.cost FROM client_tb_park_record t WHERE t.user_id = #userId# AND t.record_id = #recordId#
